Keywords



* [Your Government »](https://www.cityofonalaska.us/boards)
  + City Government
    ---------------

    The [Onalaska City Council](https://www.cityofonalaska.us/city-council) is responsible for making policy decisions, adopting ordinances, approving contractual agreements, adopting the annual budget, and making appointments such as the City Secretary and the Municipal Court Judge.

    Other Officials
    ---------------

    Here are your links to other local, state & federal officials:

    - [Other Local Officials](http://www.co.polk.tx.us/)
    - [State & Federal Officials](http://www.usa.gov/elected-officials)

* [Our Community »](https://www.cityofonalaska.us/our-community)
  + Our Community
    -------------

    Located at the heart of Lake Livingston, 80 miles north of Houston, the Onalaska area offers outdoor and recreational activities that provide fun for all ages. Visitors and residents will find a great selection of campgrounds, RV parks, marinas and restaurants. Onalaska continues to be a popular vacation and retirement community, with a small-town quality and country atmosphere.

    - [Onalaska History](https://www.cityofonalaska.us/our-community/pages/onalaska-history)
    - [Marina Locations](https://www.cityofonalaska.us/our-community/pages/map-marina-locations)

    *[Learn More...](https://www.cityofonalaska.us/our-community)*

Public Information Request
==========================

Public Information Request Procedures

Posted on: November 12, 2025 - 12:37pm

All requests for records should be submitted to Human Resources and can be submitted by the following methods:

EMAIL:                               [piarequests@cityofonalaska.us](mailto:piarequests@cityofonalaska.us)

MAIL:                                 Human Resources  
                                           PIA Requests  
                                           Po Box 880  
                                           Onalaska, Texas 77360

HAND DELIVERY:             Human Resources  
                                           372 South FM 356  
                                           Onalaska, Texas 77360

Click [HERE](https://www.texasattorneygeneral.gov/sites/default/files/files/divisions/open-government/PublicInformationRequestForm.pdf) to access the public information request form at the Texas Attorney General's website.

For guidance regarding your rights as a requestor and the public information procedures adopted by this governmental body, you may review the governmental body’s notice required under section 552.205 of the Government Code. You can find additional Public Information Act resources on the Office of the Attorney General's website [HERE.](https://www.texasattorneygeneral.gov/open-government)
